channel.title: The Twilight Throne: The Throne of Oblivion
channel.description:
***The Twilight Throne*** is a *Forged in the Dark* game set in a cursed world of powerful magical beings. The scramble for the Throne has begun, but who will be the new heir?
*You play as Nobles, dark surreal fairytale characters bound by family, power, duty, and ambition. Can you play the great game and survive the curse that your power is built on?*
![Throne|564x317](upload://sakhhUXgC3AIbJHwefyuWa4N11p.jpeg)
This is 9 sessions of Rae Nedjadi's Forged in the Dark game of dark fantasy intrigue, The Twilight Throne scheduled for Tuesday nights in February and March at 8 PM US Eastern Time.
Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. All-Access time is 7:00 PM US Eastern December 22, 2021.
**THIS IS A PLAYTEST** IT may be wonky in places, and we may have to jury rig some stuff, but I'm confident we will all have fun. Feedback will be sent to the designer. We will use Streamyard for our sessions. I’ll email all players about a week before the first session with the necessary links. Sessions will run up to three hours. We will plan to record, but I will confirm this with the players. [The Gauntlet Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and we will use Lines and Veils and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg), as well as Script Change. for safety tools.
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKCa8G1uPP8LJr6Ke_
Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKCvctbM4YhqwOSL4a
Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKD8KI_aD2W4tUYx8p
Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKDl2IOXQ4hFky7t0A
Session 5: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKDvKcVUlIPLSMRWWr
Session 6: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKE5hklUeI8f_tJscK
Session 7: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKERuXiYWppojAqEWG
Session 8: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKEi-l4ZcopF4V5Iog
Session 9: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MrKEqsNbH35VJQEriXN

item.dc:creator: @Jesseabe
item.description:
@Jesseabe wrote:

The Twilight Throne is a Forged in the Dark game set in a cursed world of powerful magical beings. The scramble for the Throne has begun, but who will be the new heir?

You play as Nobles, dark surreal fairytale characters bound by family, power, duty, and ambition. Can you play the great game and survive the curse that your power is built on?

This is 9 sessions of Rae Nedjadi’s Forged in the Dark game of dark fantasy intrigue, The Twilight Throne scheduled for Tuesday nights in February and March at 8 PM US Eastern Time.

Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. All-Access time is 7:00 PM US Eastern December 22, 2021.

THIS IS A PLAYTEST IT may be wonky in places, and we may have to jury rig some stuff, but I’m confident we will all have fun. Feedback will be sent to the designer. We will use Streamyard for our sessions. I’ll email all players about a week before the first session with the necessary links. Sessions will run up to three hours. We will plan to record, but I will confirm this with the players. The Gauntlet Code of Conduct will be in play and we will use Lines and Veils and the X-Card, as well as Script Change. for safety tools.
